channel.title: Animations! Help Me Please
channel.description:
Hello,
Im coding a cammy pvp server im trying to change to animations like uhm how they hold weapons cause some of the animations suck so i wanne fix it but every time i get errors anyone knows how to fix?
Thanks!

item.title: Animations! Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:4, topic:371289”][quote author=Soul Eater link=topic=467376.msg3418296#msg3418296 date=1291298690]

Do you know the animation ID of the item? Also if you want to add newer animations you probably will have to post this in client help because you will have to add them in customly, cammy pvp doesn’t really have those in it already.

I mean you got animations how you hold weapons like how you wear dh axe or ags or barrelchest anchor
but those are fucked up on my source so i need to change it but when i changed it i got alot of errors :S
that is where i need help with how can i change that without that it will give me errors
[/quote]

Post what you had before,

What you changed,

And you errors, please.[/quote]

is cool when i get home i will make a picture and post it ok?

Read full topic

And you errors, please.
